injectData

private void injectData(Runway runway)
Injects data into text nodes in the DOM. This method traverses every tag that's name matches HOOK_TAG and looks for a value for the key of the attribute value for the attribute with the name that matches HOOK_NAME_ATTR. The value found in dataMap replaces the textNode in the DOM.

Parameters:
runway -

highlight

inject

private void inject(ValueByEnum source,
                    java.lang.String TAG,
                    java.lang.String ATTR,
                    java.lang.Class type,
                    java.lang.Boolean removeNulls)
Injects data into text nodes in the DOM. This method traverses every tag that's name matches tagName and looks for a value for the key of the attribute value for the attribute with the name that matches idAttribute. The value found in dataMap replaces the textNode in the DOM.

Parameters:
source -
TAG -
ATTR -
type -
